about_the_game:
Play through one of the first three routes of DATING OF THE FUTURE!

In Lola's route, "Lola Deconstructed", Vee and her boss Lola decide that a shoot between the two of them will be a great way to start Vee's career off on the right foot.

All that Lola needs to do is write the script. She's been writing scripts like this for decades! How hard could it be?

That's what Lola tells herself, at least...

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit sex scenes. Visual nudity can be disabled in the game's settings.

The game references the sexual trauma of certain characters, but these events are not depicted.

The game makes reference to non-consensual sex, self harm, and suicide.

Play through one of the first three routes of DATING OF THE FUTURE!

In Lola's route, "Lola Deconstructed", Vee and her boss Lola decide that a shoot between the two of them will be a great way to start Vee's career off on the right foot.

All that Lola needs to do is write the script. She's been writing scripts like this for decades! How hard could it be?

That's what Lola tells herself, at least...
name: DATING OF THE FUTURE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Far in the future, robots rule the world. Do you have what it takes to show them some love?
